snippet: The World Futsal Championships start Thursday, and an under-18 team from New York will participate. The sport is a smaller, faster version of soccer.
abstract: New York Ecuador FC, an under-18 soccer team, plays a style called futsal, an import from South America; team is preparing to play in the World Futsal Championships; tournament has one adult division and seven youth divisions, with 64 teams from seven countries.
lead_paragraph: The World Futsal Championships start Thursday, and an under-18 team from New York will participate. The sport is a smaller, faster version of soccer.

headline.main: For Young Soccer Players, Vast Ambitions Grow in Tight Spaces
headline.print_headline: Vast Ambitions Grow in Tight Spaces
